short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to discard/suspend/hibernate all other tabs (except active ones).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***

Handy offline tool to suspend tabs and boost your performance quickly. 

No sensitive permissions needed.

Every tab suspended would be activated or refresh once you click it.
Install the SessionPaw to see the magic visually.

***

It's a part of SessionPaw's FreeApps, for more info or apps, please check https://sessionpaw.com. 🐈🐾🐾🐾
